price: Ampa sε, wͻn a wͻdii wͻn anim kan no buu (Asomafoͻ no) atorᴐfoᴐ; na sεdeε M’abufuhyeε (a εbaa wͻn so no) siteε.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
